title: the GameStop Xbox SCAM
description: Sneak peek at Ken's new channel  The used Xbox console market is WILD right now The Xbox Series S Blind Test:   My podcast @TheBackmarkers!  Subscribe!  TikTok:  Instagram:  Twitter:
